publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7897 Bill Butler: Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow 2014 on the launch of its Sport Your Trainers campaign, which asks people to swap their shoes for trainers on Commonwealth Day on 14 March 2011; encourages local authorities, schools, workplaces and MSPs of all parties to participate in the event; considers that such campaigns have the potential to engage the whole of Scotland and raise the profile of the Commonwealth Games, and wishes all involved with the campaign every success.

S3M-7897 Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March (lodged on 4 February 2011) Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Liam McArthur*, Patricia Ferguson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, John Park*, James Kelly*, Mary Mulligan*, Charlie Gordon*, David Whitton*, Jackie Baillie*, Karen Whitefield*, Jamie McGrigor*, Johann Lamont*, Des McNulty*
S3M-7897 Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March (lodged on 4 February 2011) Cathy Jamieson*, Trish Godman*
S3M-7897 Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March (lodged on 4 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Robert Brown*
S3M-7897 Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March (lodged on 4 February 2011) Gil Paterson*, Elaine Murray*
S3M-7897 Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March (lodged on 4 February 2011) Mr Frank McAveety*, Stuart McMillan*

S3M-7897 Bill Butler: Sport Your Trainers Day, 14 March—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow 2014 on the launch of its Sport Your Trainers campaign, which asks people to swap their shoes for trainers on Commonwealth Day on 14 March 2011; encourages local authorities, schools, workplaces and MSPs of all parties to participate in the event; considers that such campaigns have the potential to engage the whole of Scotland and raise the profile of the Commonwealth Games, and wishes all involved with the campaign every success. Supported by: Sandra White, Bob Doris, Liam McArthur, Patricia Ferguson, Ms Wendy Alexander, John Park, James Kelly, Mary Mulligan, Charlie Gordon, David Whitton, Jackie Baillie, Karen Whitefield, Jamie McGrigor, Johann Lamont, Des McNulty, Cathy Jamieson, Trish Godman, Jamie Hepburn, Robert Brown, Gil Paterson, Elaine Murray, Mr Frank McAveety, Stuart McMillan
